featured.text: Buddhism is the _____ religion in Thailand, with 90% of the total population identified as Buddhists.
But an actual synesthesia gene (or genes) has not been identified yet.

other.text: With the data they collect, mystery shoppers can identify areas for 15 and thereby help enhance the quality of products and services.
Research about learning styles has identified __(26)__ differences.

definition.zh_def: 識別，確認或確定某物或某人的身份或特徵。
definition.en_def: To recognize or ascertain the identity or characteristics of something or someone.
definition.example: The detective was able to identify the suspect from the security footage.
